name: vlxd
description: A Management App for VLXD Tran Ngoc
author: ET

scripts.dev: cd server && npx babel-node server | quasar dev
scripts.commitlivemaster: git add -A && git commit -m"commit dist folder for live deploy" && git push origin master
scripts.pushlive: git subtree push --prefix dist/pwa-mat origin live
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd server && gulp es6 && cd .. && npm run commitlivemaster && npm run pushlive
